name: Avoid using GC.Collect()
description: This rule list all the artifacts that use GC.Collect().
output: This report lists all artifacts using GC.Collect(). It provides the following information: Artifact full name.
rationale:
.Net framework use a garbage collector that release the memory at the most appropriate time in order to optimize the memory usage.
The GC.Collect() is a very expensive method which should be avoided.

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - Memory, Network and Disk Space Management
